ygData.subject: Re: A better dragon OOC
ygData.msgSnippet: I meant that Azure won t stop until SS is either totally unconscieous and hopelessly damaged (like until his spark is alive but useless) or he is destroyed.

I meant that Azure won't stop until SS is either totally unconscieous 
and hopelessly damaged (like until his spark is alive but useless) or 
he is destroyed. for any additional infos, see his bio

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> You make this sound like Monster Rancher (I would say
> pokemon, but pokemon don't die in that game monsters
> do). Speaking of which I just got Monster Rancher
> Advanced and let me tell you, if you were annoyed with
> Monster Rancher battle cards Nintendo has far from
> embarrassed itself THIS time.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > If that's what happens, then it'll happen. But be
> > warned, once he 
> > starts fighting, he will not stop until the other is
> > in coma or 
> > straight dead.
> >

> > wrote:
> > > OOC: Do you simple mean a better dragon than he
> > was
